The Macaulay Honors college gives you access to the Teaching and Learning Collaboratory (TLC).

<https://eportfolios.macaulay.cuny.edu/tlc/>

You can book time with the TLC to help you with learning digital technologies and even giving practice talks. The link to make an appointment is below:

<http://calendly.com/tlchelp>
